parameters.responseBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  agent: 'mockup-generator-31',
  design_id: $json.design_id,
  success: $json.success,
  status: $json.qc_result.status,
  mockups_generated: $json.qc_result.mockups_generated,
  mockup_urls: $json.qc_result.mockup_urls,
  quality_score: $json.qc_result.quality_score,
  estimated_cost: $json.qc_result.estimated_cost,
  result: $json.qc_result,
  timestamp: $json.completed_at
}) }}
